tooltips.assignmentPermission:
Allows to restrict an ability to assign records and post messages to other users.

all - no restriction

team - can assign and post only to teammates

no - can assign and post only to self
tooltips.userPermission:
Allows to restrict an ability for users to view activities, calendar and stream of other users.

all - can view all

team - can view activities of teammates only

no - can't view
tooltips.portalPermission: Defines an access to portal information, ability to post messages to portal users.
tooltips.groupEmailAccountPermission: Defines an access to group email accounts, an ability to send emails from group SMTP.
tooltips.exportPermission: Defines whether users have an ability to export records.
tooltips.massUpdatePermission: Defines whether users have an ability to do mass update of records.
tooltips.followerManagementPermission: Allows to manage followers of specific records.
tooltips.dataPrivacyPermission: Allows to view and erase personal data.

messages.changesAfterClearCache: All changes in an access control will be applied after cache is cleared.
